They sound beautiful! It's great that you fell in love with them and they've become a favorite accessory.

Now, about storing your jewelry to prevent tangling and scratching... I've got some tips for you!

1. **Use a jewelry box or case with individual compartments**: This will help keep each piece separate and prevent tangling. Look for a box with velvet or soft fabric-lined compartments to prevent scratching.
2. **Store similar items together**: Group similar items, like necklaces or earrings, together in the same compartment. This will make it easier to find what you're looking for and prevent mixing up different pieces.
3. **Use jewelry organizers or dividers**: Consider using jewelry organizers or dividers to separate your jewelry within the box. These can be found in various shapes and sizes to fit your specific needs.
4. **Roll your necklaces**: To prevent tangling, roll your necklaces into a coil and secure them with a soft cloth or paper towel. This will help prevent knots and kinks.
5. **Use soft pouches or bags**: Store delicate or small items, like earrings or rings, in soft pouches or bags to protect them from scratching and tangling.
6. **Keep your jewelry box clean and dry**: Regularly clean your jewelry box and compartments to prevent dust and dirt from accumulating. This will help keep your jewelry clean and prevent scratching.
7. **Consider a jewelry armoire or cabinet**: If you have a large jewelry collection, consider investing in a jewelry armoire or cabinet. These often have multiple drawers and compartments to store your jewelry, keeping it organized and protected.

By following these tips, you'll be able to keep your jewelry organized, prevent tangling and scratching, and make the most of your beautiful jewelry collection!
